title: Called for 'Termination' of the Constitution
summary: Trump explicitly called for suspending the Constitution, suggesting he should be immediately reinstated as president or a new election held over his false election fraud claims.
keyFacts: Truth Social post: 'A Massive Fraud of this type and magnitude allows for the termination of all rules, regulations, and articles, even those found in the Constitution'
Suggested he should be immediately reinstated as president or hold a new election
Even many Republicans condemned - Mike Pence: 'Anyone who puts himself over the Constitution should never be President'
White House: 'Attacking [the Constitution] is anathema to the soul of our nation'
Never retracted or apologized; claimed media 'misrepresented' his words
Constitutional scholars called it 'the most anti-American statement ever made by a former president'
